entry.title: Installing an Octopress theme
entry.content:
Installing a theme in Octopress is trivial. After browsing the theme catalog, I chose the “slash” theme because I prefer its sans-serif fonts and clean layout. Here’s how I installed it:

$ cd git/blog # where my octopress repo is
$ git clone git://github.com/tommy351/Octopress-Theme-Slash.git .themes/slash
$ rake install['slash']
$ rake generate

Commit your changes if you are happy and you are done!
